item.title: Introduction
item.description: What is a Mysterium Node? Mysterium Node is a piece of software which represents Mysterium Network’s element responsible for either providing or consuming a network service. Such node can be run on your Raspberry PI, Docker or any Debian based distribution. The current mobile version does not support service running. Mysterium node runner/provider A node that’s providing a service within Mysterium Network is called a Provider. Our node software can operate as a Provider or as a Consumer, but in this section lets focus on the provider side of things.
